title: SCP-106

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may choose 3 players to send to a subgame.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The subgame is night phase only, and roles with day abilities (Such as the <:townFaction:974880541348331541>Jailor (51)), may use them the night prior.
- Players inside the subgame may know who else is in the subgame.
- Once a win condition has been reached. The winners are released from the pocket dimension, and return to the main game. With the losers being dealt a corrosion level attack.
- Corrosion:Bypasses any and all defenses a player may have.
- You have a powerful autovest that sends the first person to attack you to the subgame.

desc:
Post 770
*SCP-106 is capable of passing through solid matter, leaving behind a large patch of its corrosive mucus. SCP-106 is able to “vanish” inside solid matter, entering what is assumed to be a form of “pocket dimension”.*
